2. Ꞩaprohtiegam nhe apniek Deewa Wahrds/ bett Willteneex
ligoyahs ka kahda Laiwa Juhra=willnehs.
3. Ꞩaprohtiegs Zillwähx turrahs ſtippre py Deewa Wahrdu/ vñ
Deewa Wahrds gir tam tayßnis/ ka kahda ſkaidra Walloda.
4. Ꞩayemm tahs Leetas pareiſe/ pehtz runna no tahms/ leetzees
töw pirmahk labb mahzitees/ tad tu war adbildeht.
5. Jecka Ꞩirrds gir ka kahds Ꞩkrittelis py Rattu/ vnd winja Doh-
mas täck apkahrt ka ta Rumba.
6. Ka Schkehlis ſweeds prett wiſẜahm Kehwehm/ iht ta keŗŗahs

ẜöw tas Willteneex py wiſẜeem Pullgotayeem/ vnd ẜacka:
7. Kadehļ buhs weenam Deenam ẜwehtigakam buht/ nhe ko oh-

8. Ta Kunga Ghuddriba gir tohs tha noſchkieruſẜi/ vnd wings

9. Wings gir zittus ißreddſeyis vnd ẜwähtiyis preekſch zittahm
Deenahm.
10. Ka wiſẜi Zillwähki no Semmes/ vnd Adams no Pieſchleem

11. Vnd tomähr tas Kungs tohs noſchkiriß gir/ pehtz ẜawu daſche-

12. Zittus gir wings ẜatinayis/ pa auxtenayis/ vnd ẜwehtiyis/ vnd
py ẜawu Kallpoſchanu aitzenayis. Bett zittus gir wings nolade-
yis/ vnd ſämmoyis/ vnd no winjo Aitzenaẜchanas ißgruhdis.
13. Aiſto tee gir winja Rohkà/ ka Mahls Pohdneeka Rohkà. Tas

14. Tha gir arridſan tee Zillwähki tah Rohkà/ katters tohs darri-

15. Tha gir labbums prett ļaun/ vnd ta Dſiewiba pretty to Nawu/

bus ta Auxtaka/ tad gir allaſch diwi prett diweem/ vnd weens prett

16. Es äßmu pehdige vhßmohdiß/ ka kahds kaß Ruddeny pehtz
laſẜa.
17. Vnd Deews gir mann to Ꞩahtu turr klaht dehwis/ ka es ẜawu
Kubblu arridſan pillu pedarriyis äßmu/ ka pillà Ruddeny.
18. Redſeeta/ ka es nhe äßmu mannis labbad ſtradayis/ bett wiſẜo
labbad/ kattri labpraht mahziet gribbätu.
19. Klauſẜaita mann juhs auxti Kungi/ vnd juhs Ļauſcho Walldi-

20. Nhe dohd Dählam/ Ꞩeewai/ Brahļam/ Draugam/ to War-

Manntu/ ka tas töw nhe buhß ſchäl/ vnd töw tadehļ tohs luhkt buhs.

21. Teekams tu dſiewo/ vnd ka töw Dwehſẜele wehl gir/ nhe doh-
dees appakſchan zittu Zillwäku.
22. Labbaghk gir/ ka taweem Bährneem töwis wayaga gir/ nhe ka

23. Palleetz tu Wirſeneex par tawu Manntu/ vnd nhe leetzees ta-

24. Kad taws Ghalls nahk/ ka töw nohſt buhß/ tad ißdali tawu
Manntu.
25. Lohpam peenakahs ẜawa Barriba/ Pahtaga vnd Naßta/ iht
ta Kalpam ẜawa Maiſe/ Ꞩohdiba vnd Darrbs.
26. Turri tawu Kallpu py Darbu/ tad gir töw Meers preekſch
winju/ lixi tu to ẜlinkoht/ tad grib wings Kungs buht.
27. Juhga vnd Wirrwes lohka to Kacklu/ nicknu Kallpu zeetumi
vnd Kohki.
28. Dſenn to py Darbu/ ka tas nhe eedt ẜlinkoht.
29. Ꞩlinkoſchana mahza dauds ļaun.
30. Dohd tam Darrbu/ kas Kallpam peedärr/ ja wings tad nhe
klauſẜa/ tad leetz to Zeetumà. Tomähr nhe vsleetz nhe weenam parr
leeku/ vnd turri Mähru wiſẜa Leetà.
31. Gir töw Kallps/ tad aißbildini to ka töw paſſchu/ aiſto kas win-
jam darra/ tas ſtahw prettie tawu Meeſẜu vnd Dſiewibu. Gir töw
Kallps/ tad leetz tam dſiewoht/ iht ka buhtu tu the biyis/ aiſto töw
gir winja wayaga/ ka tawas paſſchas Dſiewibas.
32. Bett ja tu to nickne turr/ ka wings kahyohp mättahs/ vnd no

CAPUT XXXIV.
1. NHeghuddri Ļaudis ẜöw paſſchus peewiļļahs ar tracku Zerree-
ſchanu/ vnd Jecki palauyahs vhs Ꞩappneem.
2. Kas vhs Ꞩappneem zerre/ tas ghrahpſta pehtz Ähnas/
vnd gribb Wehyu twarrſtiet.
3. Ꞩappnis nhe gir zittade/ ka Ghimis beß Buhſchanas.
4. Kas nheſkieſts gir/ ka warr tas ſchkieſts buht? Vnd kas nhe-
pattees gir/ ka warr taß pattees buht?

5. Paſſcha Mahziba vnd Stahſtiſchana/ vnd Ꞩappnes gir nhe-

nas/ vnd biyu tha mahzietz/ ka es wiſẜu nhe warreyu ẜatziet.
13. Vnd äßmu daſchereis tadehļ Nawes bähdahs nahzis/ teekam es

14. Nu rädſu es/ ka teem Deewabiyatayeem tas ihſtäns Gharrs

16. Kas Deewu bieſtahs/ tam nhe wayaga parr nheneekadu Leetu
iſẜabiteeß/ neds baſchitees/ Aiſto Wings gir ta zerriba.

vnd dohd Weſẜelibu/ Dſiewibu/ vnd Ꞩwehtibu.

5. No Ghräkeem attſtaht/ ta gir Deewa Kallpoſchana/ kattra
tam Kungam pattiek/ vnd mittehtees nhepareiſe darriht/ taß gir taß
ihſtäns ẜaliedſenaſchana Vpperis.

7. Aiſto taß gir arridſan darritins Deewa Pawehleſchanas puſẜes

ẜcha gir ẜallda preekſchan to Auxtaku.

9. Ta Taißna Vpperis gir ẜajemmiegs/ vnd taß pattz muhſchige

vnd paklauſẜa ta Luhkſchanu kam nhepareiſe gir notitzis.
17. Wings nhe apẜmei ta Bariņa Luhkſchanu/ neds to Attraitne/

KVngs Wiſẜewaldiegs Deews/ abſchäloyees töw par mums.
2. Vnd eeluko/ vnd ißbaideh wiſẜus Laudis.

1. ZEeni to Ahrſt ar peederrigu Dahwanu/ ka tu to dabbuiſẜi/ kad

22. Aiſto turr nhe gir atteeẜchana/ tas winjam nhe pallieds/ vnd tu

CAPUT XXXIX.
25. KAm Raxts ja=mahzahs/ taß nhe warr zittu Darrbu darriet/

ckarohs Ghoweem ehſt dohd.
28. Jht ta arridſan tee Ꞩnickeri vnd Timmermanņi/ kattri Dee-

nas Nacktis ſtrahda/ vnnd ißgraiſa Billdes/ vnnd kattram Ꞩirrds

35. Ꞩchee wiſẜi eepreezenayahs ẜöw no ẜawu Ammatu/ vnd ick kat-

36. Beß teem nhe warr Jellgawà dſiewoht.

ſtahſtiet.

39. Bett teem buhs vhß to laizigu Vhßturreſchanu ghadaht/ vnd

1. BEtt kam vs to buhß dohtees/ ka tas to Baußlu ta Auxtaka mah-

2. Tam buhß wära jembt/ ko teitzami Laudis darriyuſchi gir/ vnd

3. Tam buhs tohs gharrigas Mahzibas mahzehtees/ vñ jauzetees

5.Taß warr ẜöw licktees ẜuhtitees ẜweſſchahs Sem̃ehs/ aiſto wings

7. Wings attpleſch drohſche ẜawu Mutt/ vnd luds par wiſẜo Ļau-
ſcho Ghräkeem.
8. Vnd kad tad tas Kungs tah gir ẜaliedſenahtz/ tad dohd wings
tam to Gharru tahs Ghuddribas baggatige.
9. Ka wings ghuddru Paddomu vnd Mahzibu dohd warr warrä-
ne/ par to wings tam Kungam patteitz ẜawohs Patarohß.
10. Vnd tas Kungs dohd Schälaſtibu turr klaht/ ka winja Pad-
dohms/ vnd Mahziba ißwäddahs.
11. Vñ wings abdoma pirrmahk py ẜöw paſſchã pehtz iſẜacka wings
ẜawu Paddomu vñ Mahzibu/ vñ apleezina to ar Ꞩwätu Ghramatu.
12. Vnd dauds apẜubrinoyahs ẜöw par winja Ghuddribu/ vnd ta
muhſchige nhe ißniex.
13. Wings muhſchiege nhe taps aißmirſts/ vnd winjo Wahrds
palleek muhſcho muhſcham.
14. Ko wings mahziyis gir/ taps taļake mahziets/ vnd ta Draudſe
to teicks.
15. Kad wings dſiwoya/ by winjam leelaka Ꞩlawa/ nhe ka zitteem
tuhxtoſcheem/ vñ kad wings mirris gir/ palleck winjam ta patti ẜlawa.
CAPUT XL.
16. MAnn gir wehl kaßlabb jaẜacka/ aiſto es äßmo ka pills Mehnes.
17. Klauſẜaita mannis juhß ẜwähti Bährni/ vnd audſeeta ka
Roſes/ py Vppiſcheem dehſtitas.
18. Vnd dohdeta ẜaldu Ꞩmarrſchu no jums/ ka Wyrohks/ ẜeedee-

19. Dſeedeeta ẜlawäne/ vnd teitzeta to Kungu wiſẜohs winja Darr-
bohs/ ẜlaweyeeta winja Wahrdu ghodige.
74 Das Buch
20. Patteitzeeta winjam/ vnd teitzeeta winju arr Dſeeßmeem vnd
Pullxteneem/ vnd ẜackaita tha patteickdami.
21. Wiſẜi Darrbi ta Kunga gir ļohte labbi/ vnd ko wings pawehl/
tas noteek ihſtänàjhſtänà Laickà.
22. Vnd nhe wayaga ẜatziet/ ko buhs tam? Aiſto ẜawà Laickà nahk

Muhris/ vnd par winja Wahrdu tas Vdens ſtaweya/ iht ka buhtu

24. Wiſẜo Zillwäku Darrbs gir preekſchan winju/ vnd preekſchan
winja Atzeem gir nheneeka paſläpts.
25. Wings räds wiß no eeẜakumu tahs Paſẜaules/ lieds ghallu tahs
Paſẜaules/ vnd preekſhan winju nhe gir nheneekadas leetas jaunas.
26. Nhe gir wayaga ẜatzietz/ kadehl taß? Aiſto wings gir ickich kattru
leetu raddiyis/ ka tam jeb kurr palliedſeht buhs.
27. Aiſto winja Ꞩwähtums attſkreen ſchurr ka kahda Straume/
vnd dſirrdina to Semm/ ka kahda leela Straume.
28. Attkall winja Dußmiba aißgrahb tohs Paggaņus/ iht kad

29. Winja Darrbs gir py teem Ꞩwähteem pareiſe/ bett tee Beß-

30. Wiß kaß no Eeẜakumu raddiets gir/ taß gir labbam labb/ bett

31. Tam Zillwäkam gir py ẜawas Dſiewibas wayaga/ Vhdens/

vnd Drehbes.
32. Schee wiſẜi nahk teem labbeem par labb/ vnd teem Beßdeewi-

33. Jrr zitti Wehyi Attreepſchanas dehl radditi gir/ vnd ar ẜawu
Auku darra tee ļaun.
34. Vnd kad tai Ꞩohdibai nahkt buhs/ tad tee Auku zeļļ/ vnd beids
to Dußmibu/ taa/ katters tohs raddiyis gir.

35. Vgguns/ Kruſẜa/ Badds/ Nawe/ tee wiſẜi gir Attreepſchanas

36. Tee Swähri/ Tſchuhßkas/ Sallſſchi/ Sohbins/ gir arridſan
Attreepſchanas dehļ radditi/ tohs Beßdeewigus ẜamaitaht.
37. Preezige darra tee winja Pawehleſchanu/ vnd gir ghattawi/
kur winjam tho wayaga gir wirſẜon Semmes/ vnd kad ta Stundin-
ya nahk/ nhe nomittahs tee.
38. Tas gir/ ko es eeẜaku vnd dſieŗos raxtiet.
39. Arr Wahrdu/ ka wiß Darrbs ta Kunga labbs gir/ vnd ickkat-

40. Ka nhe wayaga ẜatziet/ Nhe wiſẜas leetas gir labbas. Aiſto
ick kattras ẜawà Laikà ghodigas gir.
41. Tapehtz buhs to Wahrdu tha Kunga ẜlaweht vnd patteickt/ar

1. WEena behdiga ẜchälotina leeta gir wiſẜo Zillwäko dſiewiba no

2. Turr gir alloſchien Bähdas/ Ghadaſchana/ Zerriba/ vnd pehtz

3. Tick lieds py to/ katters auxtà Ghodà ẜehſch/ ka py to Sämma-

4. Tick labb py to/ katters Sieſcha Drehbehs vnd Krohni wallka/

6. Jebſche wings magkeniet duß/ tad tattſche tas nhe gir nheneeka/

Waideneekus nahkam.

8. Tas no teekas wiſẜai Meeſẜi/ tick lieds Zillwäkam ka Lohpeem/

1. O Nawe/ ka ruhkta eſẜi tu/ kad vhß töw dohma kahds Zillwähx/

CAPUT XLII.
8. TEe Bährni toh Beßdeewigo/ vnd kattri py teem Beßdee-

weens ihſts labbe ißmahtziets Zillwähx/ vnnd py wiſẜeem Ļaudeem

Nomohdas/ vnnd ta Ghadaſchana par tahs/ attrauy tam dauds
Meega: teekam ta jauna gir/ ka tha buhtu pawätza kluwuſẜi/ jeb kad

nhe pareiſe turrätohs/ jeb winjam nheweens Bährns ar tahs buhtu.

CAPUT XLIII.
15. ES gribbu nu teickt ta Kunga Darrbu/ aran to ẜwätu Raxtu

25. Allaſch gir diwi prett diwi/ vñ weens prett weenu/ vnd ko wings

26. Vnd gir ickattru ißſchkieris/ py kahdas leetas tas wayadſehs.
1. VNd kaß warr winja Ghodibu ghanna ißluhkoht? Winja Gho-

5. Taß warr leels Kungs buht/ kaß to gir darriyis/ vnd gir tay pa-

6. Vnd tai Mehneſẜi buhß wiſẜà Paſẜauleh ſpiedeht ẜawà Laikà/
vnd tohs Mehneſẜis ſchkirrt/ vnd to GhadduskahrtuGhadduskahtru ißdallyt.
7. Pehts to Mehneſẜi kļuhſt tee Ꞩwähtki lagaditi/ ta gir tahds
Ghaiſchums kaß nodauſahs vnd attkal pee=aug.

11. Zaur Deewa Wahrdu turr tee ẜawu Liedſibu/ vnd nhe pekuhſt

12. Vhßluhko to Waŗŗawixne/ vnd teitz to katters to darriyis gir/

14. Zaur winja Wahrdu ẜneeg leels Ꞩnegs/ vnd wings leek brie-

17. Winja PährkonsPãrhrkons beedina to Semm/ vnnd Kallni trieſẜeh

Seemelis.
19. Vnd ka tee Puttni ſkreen/ ta ghroſahs ẜöw tee Wehyi/ vnnd
dſänn to Ꞩneegu ween zaur ohtru/ ka tas Kuppeņohß mättahs/ iht ka

20. Wings gir tick ballts/ ka taß tohs Atzis aptumſẜo/ vnd tai Ꞩirr-

21. Wings kratta to Ꞩallnu wirß Semmes ka Ꞩahli/ vnnd kad

22. Vnd kad taß auxts Seemelis puhſch/ tad kluhſt tas Vhdens
Läddus/ kur Vhdens gir/ teitan puhſch tahs pahre/ vnd apwälk Vh-

29. Turr klaht Jeroboam to Dählu Nebat/ katters Jſraeli py Äll-
kadeewibas jautzeya/ vnd wedde Ewraim Ghräkohs.
30. Vnd winjo Ghräki tappa ghann dauds/ ka tee pehts Ghalla no
ẜawas Semmes ißdſieti tappa.
31. Aiſto tee ißdomayahs wiſẜenadu Ällkadeewibu/ teekam ta Att-
reepſchana par teem nahze.
CAPUT XLVIII.
VNd taß Proweetes Elias ißlauſehs ka kahds Vgguns/ vnd
winja Wahrds dedſe ka kahda Lahpa.
2. Vnd neſẜe to dargu Laiku par teem/ vnnd darriya tohs
magjuma zaur ẜawu Dußmibu.
3. Aiſto zaur ta Kunga Wahrdu aißẜlehdſe wings to Debbes.
Trieß reiſas noneſẜe wings Vgguni ſemme.
4. Ock ka krahßnis eſẜi tu biyis Elias arr taweem Brynuma=Sie-
meem/ kaß gir tick krahßnis ka tu?
5. Zaur to Wahrdu ta Auxtaka eſẜi tu weenu Mirroni vhßmode-
nayis/ vnd attkal no Kappas ißneſẜis.
6. Tu eſẜi läppnus Koninjus ißſtuhmis no winjo Ghulltu/ vnnd
nokahwis.
7. Tu eſẜi wirſẜon to Kallnu Ꞩinai dſirrdeyis to nakoſchu Ꞩodi-
bu/ vñ eekſchan Horeb to Attreepſchanu.
92 Das Buch
8. Tu eſẜi tohs Koninjus papreekſche paſluddenayis/ kattreem ẜo-
diet by/ vnd Prophetes pehtz töw eſtadiyis.
9. Tu eſẜi nohſt jämbts Aukà/ ar Vggunigeem Ratteem vnnd
Sirrgeem.
10. Tu eſẜi eelickts ka töw ẜohdiet buhs/ ẜawà Laikà/ kluſẜenaht to
Dußmibu/ pirms ta leela Dußmiba nahk/ to Ꞩirdi to Thäwo py
teem Bährneem greeſt/ vnd tohs Zilltus Jacob attkal attneſt.
11. Labb teem/ kattri töw räds/ vnd tawas Draudſibas dehl ghodä-
ti kluhſt.
12. Tur buhs mums ta ihſtäna Dſiwiba.
13. Kad Elias Aukà nohſt by/ tad nahze winja Gharrs vhs Eliſeo
baggatige. Ꞩawà Laikà nhe iſẜabiyayahs wings preekſch nhe weenu
Leelukungu/ vnd nhe weens nhe ſpehya winju vßwarreht.
14. Wings nhe lickahs ẜöw nheneekade wallditeeß/ vnd kad wings
nomirris by/ wehl winja Meeſẜa papreekſche paſluddenaya.
15. Kad wings dſiewoya/ darriya wings Siemes/ vnd kad wings
mirris by/ darriya wings Brynumus.
16. Wehl taß nheneeka nhe palliedſeya/ ka tee Ļaudis labbaki tap-
puſchi/ vnd no ẜaweem Ghräkeem attſtatohs/ teekams tee no ẜawas
Semmes ißdſieti/ vnd wiſẜahs Semmehs ißkaiſẜiti kļua/ vnnd maß
Pullzings attlicka.
17. Vnd weens Leelskungs Davida Nammà.
18. No kattreem zitti darriya kaß Deewam paticka/ bett zitti Ghrä-
koya ļohte.
19. Ezechias apſtipprenaya ẜawu Pili/ vnd eewaddiya (etetzinaya)
Vhdeni eekſchan/ wings licka Ackminis rackt/ vnd Ackas darrieth.
20. Ꞩawa laikà vßbrucka Sanheribs/ vñ ẜuhtiya Rabſacen/ wings
pazehle ẜawu Rohku prett Zion/ vnd ghräſchoya arr leelu Leppnibu.
21. Tad eedrebbeya winjo Ꞩirrdes vnd Rohkas/ vnd tappa teem
bail/ ka kahdai Ꞩeewai Bährna Ꞩahpehs.
22. Vnd tee peeẜautze to ſchehligu Kungu/ vnd pazehle ẜawas Roh-
kas vhß winju.
23. Vnd taß Swätais Debbeſẜis paklauſẜiya tohs drieſe/ vnnd iß-
peſtiya tohs zaur Eſaiam.
Jeſus Syrach. 93
24. Wings kahwe to Spähku to Aſẜirero/ vnd winja Engeļis iß-
delldeya tohs.
25. Aiſto Ezechias darriya kaß tam Kungam patticka/ vnd palicka
ſtahwohtz vhs to Zeļļu Davida ẜawa Thäwa/ ka to mahziya Eſaias/
katters leels vnd taißnis Proweets by ẜawà Mahzibà.
26. Tha paſſchà Laickà atkahpe ta Ꞩaule attkal/ vnd wings pa-
willzenaya tam Koninjam to Dſiwibu.
27. Wings papreekſche paſluddenaya ar baggatu Gharru/ kaß
pehts notickt by/ vnd dehwe teem Noſkummuſcheem eekſchan Zion
Epreezenaſchanu/ ka tee allaſchien ẜöw warrätu epreezenateeß.
28. Wings paſluddenaya nakoſchas vnd paſlehptas leetas/ pirms
tahs wehl nahze.
CAPUT XLIX.
TAß Wahrds Joſia gir ka kahda dargo Smarrſcha Sahle no
Apteeki.
2. Taß gir ẜalds (
dialect.
ẜaldäns.) ka Mäddus Mutteh/
vnd ka Kohkleß py Wynu.
3. Tam by leela Schälaſtiba tohs Ļaudis attgreeſt/ vnnd to Nheti-
ckumu to Ällkadeewibu nolickt.
4. Wings baudiyahs no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds vhß to Kungu/ (
puta
zär-
rädams.) tas attkal pazehle to yſtänu Deewakallpoſchanu/ kad ta
Semme pilla Ällkadeewibas by.
5. Wiſẜi Koninji/ beß Davidu/ Ezechia/ vnd Joſia/ gir ẜöw ap-
ghräkojuſchees.
6. Aiſto tee attſtaya to Baußlu tha Auxtaka. Pehts ißnycka tee
Koninji Juda.
7. Aiſto teem by ẜawu Koninja Wallſlibu zitteem attſtaht/ vnd ſa-
wu Ghodibu ẜweſſcheem Ļaudeem.
8. Tee ẜadädſenaya to ißwählätu Pili tahs Swehtibas/ vnnd
ißpohſtiya winja Eelas.
9. Ka Jeremias papreekſche ẜatziyis by/ kattru tee nickne mohziya.
10. Katters Mahtes Meeſẜahs par Proweetu ißwehlähts by/ ka tã
ißrehdeht/ ẜalauſiet/ vnd ißpohſtiet/ vnd attkal arridſan vhßtaiſẜiet/
vnd dehſtiet by.
94 Das Buch
11. Heſekiels redſeya to Ghodibu ta Kunga Ꞩappni/ kattru wings
tam radiya aran teem Ratteem Cherubim.
12. Wings gir papreekſche ẜatziyis prettie teem Enaideneekeem/ vñ
Eepreezenaſchanu paſluddenayis teem/ kattri pareiſe darra.
13. Vnnd to diwipadeßmitto Proweeto Kauli ſaļļo wehl/ kurr tee
ghull. Aiſto tee gir Jehcobu eeprezenayuſchi/ vñ Peſtiſchanu ẜoliyu-
ſchi/ kattru teem leelo Ghaidiſchanu (
alii
leelo Ghaidiſchan) ghaidiet by.
14. Ka gribbam mehs Sorobabeli teickt? Katters ka kahds
Ghrädſähns py labbahs Rohkas by.
15. Vnd JEſus to Dählu Joſedech/ kattri ẜawà Laika to Baſnizu
darriya/ vnd to ẜwätu Nammu tam Kungam attkal vßzehle/ kattram
pallickt by par muhſchigu Ghodibu.
16. Vnd Nehemias gir allaſchien teiktins/ katters mums tohs ẜa-
dauſitus Muhŗus attkal vßtaiſẜiyis gir/ vnd tahs Wahrtis arr Atſlä-
geem darriyis/ vnd muhſẜus Nammus attkal vßzehlis.
17. Nheweens nhe gir wirſẜon Semmes raddiets/ kaß Enocham
liedſe buhtu/ aiſto wings gir no Semmes nohſt jämbts.
1817. Ney Joſewam/ katters by weens Kungs par ẜaweem Brah-
ļeem/ vnd vhßturrätays ẜawo Ļauſcho.
19. Winja Kauli tappa attkal mayahs näßti.
20. Seths vnd Sems gir ſtarpan teem Ļaudeem leelà Ghoda bi-
yuſchi.
21. Bett Adams gir ghodahts par wiß kaß dſiewo/ ka wings pir-
makais no Deewu raddiets gir.
CAPUT L.
SJmons taß Dähls
Oniae
ta Auxta Baſnizakunga/ katters
ẜawa Laika par to Nammu Ghangjus darriya/ vnd Pielerus
py to licka.
2. Vnd to Pamattu ohterteek ißzehle/ vnd aukſcham to Apkartejä-
mu Ghangji py Baſnizas attkal ẜataiſẜiya.
3. Ꞩawà Laikà by ta Acka ẜakrittuſẜi/ to apwarroya wings.
4. Wings bähdayahs ẜawo Ļauſcho Nhelaimibas dehl/ vnd ap-
ſtipprenaya to Pili prett teem Enaideneekeem.
Jeſus Syrach.
5. Wings darriya teitzamu Darrbu/ ka taß tohs Ļaudis attkal py
ihſtänas Peederreſchanas peewedde.
6. Kad wings no to Preekſcha kaŗŗamu Autu attkal ißgaya/ tad
ſpydeya wings ka ta Rieta=Swaigſne zaur teem Paddebbeſẜeem/ ka
taß pillais Mehnes.
7. Ka ta Ꞩaule ſpied vhß to Baſnizu tha Auxtaka/ ka ta Waŗŗa-
Wiexne ar ẜawu Krahßnu Rohtu.
8. Ka kahda diſchana Rohſe Pawaſẜary/ ka tahs Lielies (tee Pugki)
py Vhdens/ ka taß Wieroka=kohx Pawaſẜary.
9. Ka kahds edädſenahts Wierohks Ꞩmarrſcha traukà.
10. Ka kahds Sälts Bickeris ar wiſẜenadeem dahrgeem Ackmi-
neem eedarrinahts.
11. Ka kahds augliegs Ölyakohx/ vñ ka taß auxtakais Cypreſẜes kohx.
12. Kad wings tohs krahßnus ghaŗŗus Ꞩwahrkus aptehrpe/ vnd
wiſẜu to Krahßnibu apwillkahs/ vnnd py to Ꞩwähtu Altari ghaya/
tad wings wiſẜu to SwähtumuSwhätumu jauke apkahrt darriya.
13. Bett kad wings no to Baſnizakungo Rohkam tohs vppera Ghab-
balus jehme/ vnd py Vgguns ſtaweya/ katters wirſẜon Altari dedſe.
14. Tad ſtaweya winja Brahli wiſẜi apkahrt to ka tee Cedreskohki
wirſẜon to Libano dehſtiti/ vnd apthwere to ka Pupuļo=ſaŗŗi.
15. Vnd wiſẜi Aarona Bährni ẜawa Krahßniba/ vnd turreya ta
Kunga Vpperi ẜawà Rohkà preekſchan to wiſẜu Pullku Jſrael.
16. Vnd wings paſtelleya ẜawu Darrbu vß to Altari/ vnd darriya
tha tam Auxtakam/ tam Wißſpehzigakam weenu krahßni Vpperi.
17. Wings ißſteepe ẜawu Rohku arr to dſeŗŗamo Vpperi/ vnd vppe-
reya ẜarkanu Wynu/ vnd lehya py to Dibbinu tha Altara/ par ẜalldu
dial.
ẜalldanu) Ꞩmarrſchu tam Auxtakayã/ katters wiſẜo Konings gir.
18. Tad ẜauze tee Bährni Aarona ſtippre/ vnd puhte ar Trummet-
teŗeem/ vnd trohxneya ghauſche/ ka tee peeminnehti taptu preekſchan
to Auxtaku.
19. Tad kritta wiſẜi Ļaudis py ſemmes/ vhs ẜawu Waigu/ vnd pe-
luhdſe to Kungu/ ẜawu Wißſpehzigu Auxtaku Deewu.
20. Vnd te Dſeedatayi teitze to arr Dſeeßmeem/ vnd wiß taß Nam̃s
attſkanneyahs no to myligu Trohxni.
96 Das Buch
21. Vnd tee Ļaudis peluhdſe to Kungu to Auxtaku/ ka wings grib-
bätu ſchehliegs buht/ teekam tai Deewakallpoſchanai Ghalls tappa/
vnd tee ẜawu Darrbu pabeiguſchi by.
22. Kad wings nu attkal ſem̃e nonahze/ tad ißſteepe wings ẜawu Roh-
ku/ par wiſẜu to pullku tho Bährno Jſrael/ vñ dehwe teem to ẜwehtibu
ta Kunga ar ẜawu mutt/ vñ wehleya teem peſtiſchanu winjà wahrdà.
23. Tad luhdſe tee attkal/ vñ vßjehme to Ꞩwehtibu no to Auxtaku.
24. Vnd ẜatziya: Nu pateitzeeta wiſẜi Deewam/ katters leelas Lee-
tas darra wiſẜahs mallahs/ katters mums no Mahtes Meeſẜas dſie-
wus vßturr/ vnd darra wiſſu labbu.
25. Wings ghribbotu dohdt mums preezigu Ꞩirrdi/ vnnd dohde
allaſchien Meeru/ muhſẜohs laikohs eekſchan Jſrael.
26. Vnd ka winja Schälaſtiba muhſchige py mums palleek/ vnd
attpeſti mums/ teekams mehs dſiewoyam.
27. Diwyadus Laudis es no Ꞩirrds nhe warru eeredſeht/ bett tohs
treſſchus es no Ꞩirrds tha eeniedu/ ka zittu nhe weenu.
28. Tohs Samariteŗus/ tohs Philiſteŗus/ vnd to tracku Pullku
eekſchan Sichem.
29. Ꞩcho Mahzibu vnd Ghuddribu gir ẜchinny Ghramatà eraxti-
yis Jeſus Syracha Dähls no Jeruſalem/ vnnd no ẜawas
Ꞩirrds tadu Mahzibu ißkrattiyis.
30. Labb tam/ kaß ẜöw tadà mahzahs/ vnd kaß to währa jäm/ taß
taps ghuddris.
31. Vnd ja wings pehts to darra/ tad wings py wiſẜahm leetahm
derrehs/ aiſto ta Kunga Ꞩwetze to wadda.
Weena Luhkſchana Jeſu Syracha Dähla.
ES pateitzhu töw Kungs vnd Konings/ vnnd teitzu töw Deewu
mannu Peſtitayu.
2. Es pateitzu tawam Wahrdam/ ka tu mans Ghlabbotaiß
dial.
Ghellbetays.) vnd palliegs eſẜi/ vnd mannu Meeſẜu no ẜamaita-
ſchanas/ 3. No Wirrwes tahs nhetaißnas Mehles/ vnd Mällku-
lo/ atpeſtiyis eſẜi.
4. Vnd eſẜi man palliedſeyis prettie teem Enaidneekeem/ vnd eſẜi
Jeſus Syrach. 97
man ißpeſtiyis pehts tawas leelas vnd auxte teiktas Schälaſtibas/ no
to Ruhkſchanas tho/ kattri man aprieth gribbeya.
5. No tahm Rohkam tho/ kattri prett mannas Dſiewoſchanas ſta-
weya/ no dauds Nhelaimibas/ eekſchan kattreem es biyu.
6. No to Paggal/ kattra man apdäwaſẜi by/ iht no paſẜchas Vg-
guns/ ka es tur widdu nheẜadäggu/ no tahs Rieklas tahs Elles.
7. No teem nhetaißneem Wehſtneſſcheem vñ Mällkuļļeem/ par to
Koninju/ vnd no nhetaißnu Teeſẜu.
8. Es biyu tai Nawei tuwe/ vnd manna Dſiewiba tick jaw nhe by
Elleh egrimmuſẜi.
9. Es biyu apkahrt kahrtim apſtahts/ vñ nhe weens man paliedſeya.
10. Es meckleyu Palligu py teem Zillwähkeem/ vnd nhe attraddu
nhe weenu.
11. Tad es eeghadayahs/ Kungs/ tawas Schälaſtibas/ vnd ka tu
allaſchien paliedſeyis eſẜi.
12. Aiſto tu ißpeſti wiſẜus kattri vhß töw ghaida/ vnd paliedſi tohs
no tahm Rohkam tho Paggaņo.
13. Es peeluhdſchu Deewu prett to Dußmibu/ vnd nopuhßdams
luhdſchu par Atpeſtiſchanu no Nahwes.
14. Vnd peeẜautſchu to Kungu mannu Tähwu vnnd Walldita-
yu/ ka tas no mann nhe atſtahtu bähdahs/ vnnd kad tee Ghräſni läp-
poya/ vnd kad man Palliga nhe by.
15. Es teitzu tawu Wahrdu beß Mitteſchanas/ vnd es ſlaweyu vnd
pateitzu töw.
16. Aiſto manna Luhkſchana gir paklauſẜita/ vnd tu eſẜi man attpe-
ſtiyis Noẜamaitaſchanas/ vnd no wiſẜas Nhelaimibas.
17. Tadehl gribbu es töw Kungs pateickt/ vnd ſlaweht/ vnd tawu
Wahrdu teickt.
18. Kad es wehl Jauns biyu/ pirms es wehļ pewillts tappu/ meckle-
yu es to Ghuddribu nhebydams/ ar mannu Luhkſchanu.
19. Baſnizà es tadehl luhdſchu/ vnd gribbu to lieds patt mannam
ghallam meckleht.
20. Manna Ꞩirrds lyxmoyahs ẜöw par tahs/ iht kad tee Wyna=

ohgi eenahk/ Es ghayu arr tahm Kahyam py tohs/ vnd waizayu no
pirmahs Bährnibas pehts tahs.
21. Es klauſẜiyohs vhß tahs/ vnd vhßjehmu to.
22. Tad es labbe mahziyohs/ vnd ļohte peeaugu zaur tahs.
23. Tapehts pateitzu es tam/ kã man Ghuddribu dehwe.
24. Es dſieŗohs pehts tahs darryhtdarryth vnd man raddinatees eekſchan
Labbumu/ vnd es tadehl nhe tappu Kaunà.
25. Es mohziyohs no Ꞩirrds pehts tahs/ vnd biyu tſchacklis pehts
tahs darrieht.
26. Es pazehlu ẜawas Rohkas vhß Debbeſẜi.
27. Tad tappa manna Dwehſẜele apſkaidrota arr ta Ghuddribu/
ka es ẜawu Trackumu attſinnu.
28. Es ſtaweyu ſtippre pehtz winjas/ Winja vnd Es tappam wee-
na Ꞩirrds no Eeẜakumu/ vnd atraddu to ſkieſtu/ tapehts es nhe tap-
ſchu nohſt mäſts.
29. Mañai ẜirrdei illgoyahs pehtz tahs/ vñ es atraddu labbu Mañtu.
30. Taß Kungs gir man zaur tahs jaunu Mehl dehwis/ ar to grib-
bu es to teickt.
31. Nazeeta ſchurr py man juhs kattri dauds nhe eſẜeeta maziyu-
ſchees/ vñ eita py man Skohlà/ vnd ko juhskojuhs nheſinnaht/ to juhß ſchei-
tan warreeta mahzitees.
32. Aiſto juhß eſẜeeta patteeſẜe ļohte ißtwikuſchi.
33. Es äßmu ẜawu Mutt attplehtiß vnd mahziyis/ domayeeta nu vñ
pirzeeteeß Ghuddribu/ kad juhß beß Naudas to warraht dabbuit.
34. Vnd dodahd juhſẜu Kacklu appakſchan winjas Jughu/ vnd
leezeetees mahzitees/ ta gir taggad tuwumà attraſtina.
35. Vßlukoyeeta man/ man by maſu brydi mozitees vnd ſtrahdat/ vnd äßmu
leelu Epreezenaſchanu attraddiß.
36. Vßjemmeeta to Mahzibu/ ka kahdu leelu Ꞩuddraba Manntu/ vnd pa-
turreeta to/ ka kahdu leelu Sälta Ghabbalu.
37. Preezayetees juhs tahs Deewa Schälaſtibas/ vnd nhe kauneyetees
winju ſlaweht.
38. Darraita kaß jumß pawälätz gir/ tekams jums Laix gir/ tad wings jums
labbe maxahs ẜawa Laika.
